data.hoverLabel: Visit from Rosemarry School to FabLab Bhutan
data.modalTitle: Visit from Rosemarry School to FabLab Bhutan
data.modalText: A group of young and inspiring students along with few Teachers from Rosemarry Primary School, Thimphu  visits Fablab Bhutan on 22 May 2019 . The Kids have been introduced the little bits, how to play with the little bits, introduction on the different types of machines available in the lab. They were also Showcased with some of the products made from the machines.
